availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James F. Wheatley (Union County, KY, resident)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah A. Pritchett Wheatley in Union County on January 8, 1861. Father of William Wheatley and Edward Wheatley. Farmer in Union County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #994027-994058, p. 10.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Corydon Precinct, p. 28B.
